column1: # This file defines financial parameters for different infrastructure financing categories.
# Each category represents a complete financing profile that determines both CAPEX and OPEX costs to the community.
# - financing_status: Categorical identifier used in scenario configurations
# - description: Brief explanation of the financing category
# - capex_cost_multiplier: Fraction of capital costs paid by community (0.0 = none
# - has_debt_service: Whether this category includes loan repayment (true/false)
# - loan_term_years: Duration of loan repayment (0 if no loan)
# - interest_rate: Annual interest rate for loan (0.0 if no loan)
# - opex_cost_multiplier: Fraction of O&M costs paid by community (0.0 = none
# - notes: Additional context about the financing category
# Data source: Typical financing structures for community infrastructure projects
